ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] pauses
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, and enchanters get a group Werewolf illusion at 50 :o) That oughta be fun for those werewolf hunters in WK *eg* -=B=- 44th The Rathe ... From: Mott,
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, and enchanters get a group Werewolf illusion at 50 :o)
That oughta be fun for those werewolf hunters in WK
*eg*

-=B=-
44th
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: "Mott, Mike J." <mike.j.mott@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 13, 2000 8:00 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] pauses


> I just got the following from EQ Casters Realm regarding new bard songs
for
> the Velious expansion. The link is:
>
> http://eq.castersrealm.com/spells/velious.asp
>
> The songs are:
>
> Cantana of Soothing Party: Heal, Mana, and Stamina Regeneration 34
> Melody of Ervaj Area Effect Mana Drain (Max: 225) 49
> Shield of Song Group Damage Absorption (Max: 20 per tick) 50
> Occlusion of Sound Single Target Magic Based Direct Damage (Max: 42) 55.
> Composition of Ervaj Drain Mana From Target (Max: 350) 60.
>
> Obviously these are subject to change, but it appears we will get a damage
> absorbtion song back for the one we lost (useful? who knows) and get an
> earlier level Cantana (I really like this one).
>
> There are two mana drain songs in this list...which makes me wonder if
> Velious creatures will actually have a limited mana pool.
>
> As far as the Direct Damage goes...dont we have a much better DD than this
> in the mid-50's?
>
> Lago Bardoon of Bertox, 51st Minstrel, Defenders of Aleria
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
>
